avalancheActivity.comment: The early morning will see favourable avalanche conditions generally. As the day progresses on very steep sunny slopes there will be only a slight increase in the danger of gliding avalanches and moist snow slides. Some small natural avalanches are possible.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Gliding avalanches and moist snow slides are to be expected from the middle of the day.

snowpackStructure.comment:
As a consequence of falling temperatures and low relative humidity a crust will form on the surface during the night. These conditions will foster a substantial stabilisation of the snowpack in all aspects.

Above approximately 2000 m there are 20 to 30 cm of snow, and even more in some localities. Snow depths vary greatly, depending on the infuence of the wind. At low altitude from a snow sport perspective, insufficient snow is lying.

tendency.highlights: Monday: The danger of gliding avalanches and moist snow slides will persist.
